Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Madison/Ashland
ShortDescription: Westbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Ashland, Washington, Paulina and Madison: due to, street blockage near Madison/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Ashland, Washington, Paulina and Madison: due to, street blockage near Madison/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
